title: Just seeing if anyone else feels the way I do
body: Is anybody else just getting pissed off with this game rather than having fun recently? It just seems that there is so much stuff unchecked and unbalanced and the amount of damage going around is insane. I still play the game but I'm hesitant to say I'm having fun at the moment. Is anyone else feeling like this? Am i missing something?

replies.body: Its not fun though for a different reason. Feeding is rampant in season 8. Every game is a one sided hardstomp. This is not fun at all.

Depends, what are you looking for?

i stopped playing to win back in s6 and i've enjoyed the game alot more

as whiny as it sounds, there just seems like there are too many one shot scenarios now and when im losing. even with friends, it's not even fun. Me and my friends are just pissed off at the game at and each other now when we play rather than goofing off

hmm... let me see if i can somehow help you


Here's my look on the game and such, it's a competitive PvP game that gets constantly updated, there will be all sorts of metas and everyone will get their turn so you just have to be patient, like back in season 5... tanks were god. season 6 (idk if im wrong go ahead and correct me if i am) syndra and oriana in the midlane dictated the game(with the help of tanks). 

Season 7 was mainly supports dictating how the game went cause redemption, ardent etc etc.

Season 8... yea you get the idea im just rambling at this point
Damage has gotten buffed, and CC is so much stronger now.... there needs to be nerfs to certain things IMO.

I stopped having fun the second I started playing Ranked and realized just how few people play to win anymore

its became harder and less forgiving for mistakes and that made the game more serious than before that why when u play with a person that not serious about winning the match will end up a very bad experience and frustration too

Nah you aren't alone, I play so rarely that you might as well say I quit the game.

Never thought that would happen to be honest and yet here we are.
Recently? League's been shit since Pre-season 8.  It has not been fun for the past 9 months.
Its kinda a middle-ground with me.... if I'm not playing with some friends... then no... its not so fun... otherwise, its mbe fun... mbe boring, or just plain infuriating
